author: fabiocos
body: It has been agreed with PPD/PdmV and O&C to have dedicated 8_0_X and 9_4_X builds for the Ultra-Legacy HLT on MC where the production architecture is moved from slc6 to slc7 to allow a seamless step-chain processing. This will be reverted after the builds, so as not to modify possible further updates for ongoing production not related to UL builds.
title: Temporarily move the production architecture for 8_0_X and 9_4_X to slc7
